name: John Stick - Proof of Concept
description:
John's wife left him. Took everything. The only thing John had left to remember her by was a head of lettuce in the fridge. John bonded with the lettuce immediately. He glued eyes on it. Even let it sleep in his bed. Then one day, a gang of malicious snails came and beat John up and ate his precious lettuce. It was time for John Stick to get revenge!

This is just a proof of concept. You will have to find and walk over the switches. There is no sound or graphical feedback of any sort, but trust me, it did something. Find a way to open the sealed room and get to the beer.

Use a controller if possible (Left analog stick to mode and A to jump), otherwise arrows or A and D to move and space to jump.
